Need Help Now? Dial or text 988 or chat online

988: We Hear You

When you or someone you care about is struggling with mental health – we hear you. Call or text 988 or chat online for the direct connection you need for support.

  • Connect to Help

New York 988

What is 988?

The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline connects you with trained mental health counselors. It's free, confidential, and available 24/7 in English and Spanish.

Spread the Word

Struggling with your mental health is more common than you think. 1 in 4 people deal with a mental health issue at some point during their lifetime. It's time to talk about it.
